Make sure the sharpening tool is running along the edge of the battery pieces.  Step 4: Take the cotton ball and place it over the top of the battery pieces.  Step 5: Light the cotton ball with the flame from the battery.  Step 6: Run the sharpening tool along the edge of the battery pieces until they are sharp.  Step 7: Use the sharp battery pieces to make a bomb.</s>
